quote: Everything in my head was secondhand, too: Catholicism; Ireland's sad history, a litany of suffering and martyrdom drummed into me by priests, schoolmasters and parents who knew no better.
quote_letters: EVERYTHING IN MY HEAD WAS SECONDHAND TOO CATHOLICISM IRELANDS SAD HISTORY A LITANY OF SUFFERING AND MARTYRDOM DRUMMED INTO ME BY PRIESTS SCHOOLMASTERS AND PARENTS WHO KNEW NO BETTER
